alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 09 at 2:57PM CDT until July 13 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: .Between 3 and 6 inches of rain fell over the basin area since Thursday morning, causing very high lake levels from runoff into Lake Springfield. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by upstream dam release release continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Illinois, including the following county, Sangamon. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...This release of water will cause rapid rises on Sugar Creek, downstream of the dam. Rapid flooding of low-lying areas along the creek will result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued. PLAN NOW so you will know what to do in an emergency. Keep informed by listening to local radio and television for statements and possible warnings. Follow the advice of public safety officials.
